the_case: Let me make the case for self-taught tinkerer who builds things for fun, not just profit.. You're passionate about programming and hardware. You've built multiple projects including Discord bots, audio libraries, automation tools, and you're actively experimenting with AI/ML. You learn by doing and share your work.
